characters designs and stories are well made but the main overall plot is non existent adventurer rank begins the miserable abyss and artifact gearing grind which ruins the game expensive gacha terrible rates do not chase gacha caution and do not spend any money on this game to enjoy it second anniversary event was moving settings sliders devs will never fix any problems ex notifications still broken after two years no android controller support quitting the game has been the best

a number of issues have built up over time but the worst for me has been the gameplay and damage output issues with new characters especially dehya i am also disappointed we still do not have a resin cap or regeneration increase despite so many new bosses this has all been met with radio silence by the devs i am still enjoying the game but they get a star until they actually listen to player feedback

i reach out to customer service and they said that my phone is not compatible to install this game i just bought this phone this year and when i initially install the game works well after few weeks the game crash and got error saying system user interface is not responding tried to do basic trouble shooting but nothing works then when i check google play store it says on compatibility that it works on your device so i re installed it but fater couple of days it carsh again with the same error

it has been years since the release of the game and yet no controller support is given to android users showing favoritism in devices are an eyesore the storyline gets boring once you progress and you are forced to eat all the dialogues that are so long each dialogue only contains an important detail but the rest is bull overall the gacha system makes it a bearable game but with all the negative factors given it is not a game recommended for those who dislike faulty controls

really great game but i just recently spent dollars on a controller just to find out that there is no controller support for android like come on not funny other than that the graphics are really great and i love the story but if you could just add controller support for android i will put five stars and tell all my friends to play your games but right now i will play games that actually do have controller support for all devices but only because i cannot the touch screen much for reasons

it is a great game but the upcoming sumeru characters look like vanilla pudding and considering they are supposed to be from south asia the middle east and north africa that is a problem for me not only that but there are some other issues a lack of end game content an artifact system that has way too much rng some lazy writing with long dialogue options that are unskippable and an underdeveloped cooperative system i have loved this game and it is a comfort for me but there is issues

this is a game with which i have mixed feelings how to make a technically flawless game with great visuals great music good gameplay though with a for my taste forgettable story a lack of originality botw and its idiosyncrasies and a huge and sometimes boring open world and above all with dopaminergic overstimulation carefully designed to induce addiction and not necessarily fun in short a frankenstein with an identity crisis cute but ordinary

the game play is accurate but the pictures and ads portray the gameplay itself as very clear the game is very blurry for mobile and at the best settings very pixelatedi am told this was not always the case how do i fix the graphics to match the advertisements shown i have a pretty high end phone as well snap dragon with gigabyte ram i do not know what else it could be if the graphics were fixed this would be an easy four stars maybe five

good graphics on it but it is a copy of zelda the enemies are similar as well there is no real different biome and it looks the same the reasoni am not saying stuff about them copying the glider is because it is a good way to travel and without it everyone will complain about the travel being slow the puzles are not even puzles as they show you the way and paimon is super annoying and they show cut scenes like at the start swim over the lake for no reason just a zelda copy

this version of the game both looks runs and feels worse than the pc version this version does not even correctly recognize the refresh rate of my display and chugs on my device despite it having gigabyte of ram and a snapdragon triple which leaves the app a ton of overhead that it is not even using which makes absolutely no sense

the game is ten out of ten on pc however the mobile version should use some work it is extremely laggy even with everything at it is lowest settings my best guess is the character models have too many polygons for a mobile device to render yeti am not a programmer i would suggest to play this on your computer if you have one cause it runs much better on there

have been playing since the beginning literally nothing to do here anymore five minutes daily quests and ten minutes events twice in a month no worthy heroes to level up nothing to farm at this point thought the anniversary event might help but it turned out to be quite unsatisfactory as well it is probably nice to play in the beginning but the late game is boring and unrewarding af edit since then they have made some quality of life changes and that is the only reason i add a star

amazing game it is easy to play and has fantastic graphics the only issue is it takes it a very long time to load cutscenes i think this is because it is built closer to a console or pc game but it still is fun however you cannot really call the limited character banners banners because the pity guaranteed five star summon does not guarantee the rate ip character you are going for

i love this game to bits but there are so many things that could be fixed primo and five star characters should be way easier to get the pity system is also strange i feel like a five star could at least be every it is not too hard but it is still a bit of a challenge for free to play players that do not play for hours on end every day

pretty decent at first wonderful graphics and amazing character designs however as you level up it becomes increasingly difficult to gain any items for gacha summons and just to progress resin an in game item used to progress replenishes way too slow overall a fun experience but many fundamental flaws that ruin it

i came into this game really hoping to like it since everyone else seemed to like it but there is too many issues for me to really enjoy it first off is the awful quests you get sent on they range from ridiculously simple to almost impossible to complete without a guide secondly is the level scaling with the overworld mobs and monsters mobs get way too strong and dungeons become nigh impossible the story is interesting but it is locked behind your level and leveling up is a chore

endgame content is just abyss but the game gives you very little materials for powering up a character it is been a year yet artifact rng is still the worst the game is fun the first time you play it but once you reach the endgame there is nothing else to do you cannot even replay watch past archon story quests i will be uninstalling the game once my welkin ends i hope genshin will be better if i ever return

at first the game looked great but in time you start realizing all that is wrong with it is mechanics first of all there is the resin system it takes too long to regenerate and you need a lot of it to upgrade characters weapons and artifacts secondly there is artifacts the amount of luck that you need to get a decent set is incredible not talking about substats even just getting the right main stat may require weeks if you have bad luck unfortunately the letter limit stops me here

the artifact rate is trash the resin system is trash the only good about the game is the starting story the grafict and the character design three month of grinding at adventure rank and only one useable artifact the more you play the game the less fun it became at adventure rank plus for me it trash the fun was gone at the chinese new year the whole year playing the game only a few months is enjoyable

game is fun for the first few weeks great for playing instead of doing homework carried me through virtual class but around endgame game gets repetitive and boring the updates are not really fun and commissions are a chore the banners are all rerolls never anything completely new the weapons are all basically the same and the cooperative is poorly made free to play is okay but quite annoying after you get the limited banner character b constellationthe next one is a chance sad where the game is at

it started very well the base of the game is amazing characters exploration world design music but mihoyo does not care for their player base and is unwilling to change the player rewards specifically for long term veterans are really non existent this is separate from the anniversary reward backlash the games rewards as a whole are so greedy and even though i have invested a lot of money and time i get back nothing i am nearing quitting because there simply is not any endgame content

genshin has grown to be a beautiful game with potential to blow every other game out of the water i have been playing it everyday since start but lately i already see the patterns of a game falling off the radar one it just does not feel like the game does not reward the players for their loyalty two the promotions are coming from the players and the reward for all the hardwork put in is close to nothing three the gacha system is terrible in this game just awful there is more sadly

i play on ps but i decided to review here i used to really love this game and i still do but after you reach adventure rank there is nothing to do anymore this game feels more like a chore than an actual game which really sucks because when i first got my ps the first game i have ever downloaded was genshin impact the quests are draining artifact drop rates are horrible so it takes more than a month to finish building a character gacha rates suck resin system is a huge issue things need to change

it is been a year of playing this game and all i would say is that with recent updates unless you have high end mobile devices it is pretty hard to play the game as it tend to lag and crash cutscenes tend to go black screen and audio goes bonkers in terms of events i feel like it has been going downslope as time goes on there is no end game gradual progression is time gated and rng and event rewards feel so lackluster it does not feel like a reward at all

really bad rates for items this game has a gambling system that preys on children and adults alike the gameplay is nice but the system of getting characters or new weapons are very poor the developers would require you to spend more than necessary compared to other gacha games the number of repetitive three star weapons is also very high with a limited number of options there is a higher chance of getting pieces of each three star weapons than completing a set of four star weapons one each bad

game is beautiful it has many unique things but once you reach a higher adventure rank there is no content anymore it gets boring all you do is farm some domains and you cannot do much of that either because of the resin cap and that is it you log out there is no more fun left no content just nothing resin cap too high and content too low artifact farming takes months before you get even a single decent piece there are so many things that could should be changed unofortunately

when i first started this game it was amazing lots to do big open world story quests but as time went on many of the issues became appare not electro reactions suck artifact rng is horrible no end game content bad resin system characters weak on release character bugs never being fixed or addressed and a bunch of other qol issues after community submitting feedback for over a year nothing has changed and there has been no communication or acknowledgement of the glaring issues

this has to be one of the best games i played the graphics the music it is all awesome but there is no end game content well we could farm artifacts and bosses but the resin system eight minute for a single resin is a bit too much decreasing the time to restore resin would be a nice most games would give awesome rewards on anniversary especially the first one then mihoyo decided to make the rewards gacha too good game bad company

i really did like this game on launch i played for a month straight forward a year later and everything became boring the events are unoriginal and a chore to do the story quests are inconsistent in pacing and content there was even one with a million plot holes and the combat is lackluster apart from character skills there is nothing enjoyable about the combat once you get used to the characters you have everything gets old really quickly

two words anniversary rewards edit anniversary rewards got better but still boring as f because everything just feels like a chore i loved this game so immensely just three weeks back but nowi am just not enjoying it as much events are almost the same thing combat as button mashy as ever props to the graphics and music though inazuma was rushed in my opinion the enemy army and the rebels army was just or less guys going at it with each other it was more of a brawl than a war

game is free and some of the content is good i do not like the resin system and most of the artifacts that i get from the dungens is garbage i feel like the drop rate is rigged for example if i try to farm the set i want alone in my world i do not get the set i want but if i farm it in my friends world i get it easily we me and my friend try to farm our sets by visiting one another its so frustrating and gems are so over priced i have spend money on this game but now i wish did not

the gameplay is fun but improving your team in this game is extremely slow you need to kill the same boss a lot of times farm a large amount of gold exp and skill books so you need more than a month worth of energy to reach max level and level the skills to level nine level ten requires a very limited item for a single character do not forget about the equipment the rng for getting artifacts is insane you could be farming for months to get a set of just decent artifacts also spending energy

the content drought is real rewards are also highly scarce when you go up the world level it becomes frustrating unless you pay for it it will be very boring in the endgame and that is putting it lightly too much flaws that needs to be addressed such as the rng artifacts system and resin and that is barely scratching the surface

the game was all fine and dandy in the beginning but they started getting greedy and lazy as the game went on the rewards for the anniversary are the obvious but other than that there are more issues than i can type with the word limit kokomi being an absolutely useless unit yoimiya having a broken kit the rushed story quests and the list goes on some are not even that hard to fix you can do better mihoyo

amazing artistic choices are clearly visible in the environment and the game has great storytelling and appealing multidimensional characters though problems still arise the gacha system is very greedy the resin system inhibits endgame progression and the lack of account security is concerning to say the least edit mihoyo have clearly demonstrated that they do not listen to the player base whatsoever nor do they care about the current state of the game hopefully they can hastily resolve this predicament and reengage with the community because i can no longer recommend this game to anyone

i have played this game since october of without any amount of spending into account genshin impact itself at it is core is not a horrible game the graphics are good the controls are smooth the combos on each character and elemental combos are nice the story is interesting but extremely slow so far with the game being out a year now and only one new area out of three problems being resin being too restrictive for free to play players making farming generally horrible across the board

i had pre registered for genshin when it came out and loved it but when you get to some of the mid adventure ranks the grind gets tedious the drops do not increase get better very much and when they do event rewards they do not give you as much as they did when the game was fresh which is rather annoying because that means they want you to spend money on their gatcha stuff which makes it harder to be free to play and still be good

how about google stops taking down my reviews first of all the state of the game has been disastrous for the past two patches new characters released with bugged or underperforming kits existing characters having bugs for months and no balance patches for a specific character since patch one two the latest main story quest has been extremely rushed leaving out too many detials and raising questions but in a bad way the quality of the game certainly dropped recently

a beautiful world and a good experience with fun gameplay at first but later in the game almost nothing i do feels truly rewarding the rewards are always so underwhelming and building new characters is no longer as fun for me because of how difficult it is as a result of the games strange character leveling system and the tedium that comes with collecting the limited resources i would give a much higher rating if it was not for it is major flaws that become appare not in the endgame

this game is seriously amazing cross platform allows me to log onto my pc and continue playing when i want as long as you do not mind the gacha element it is a terrific free l open world zelda botw style adventure with a great story edit after a year of playing and grinding i find new five characters way too costly in terms of play time and the rewards are so excruciatingly minimal cannot recommend this game anymore

for about a year now the game is now getting boring imagine having more characters even though the game is still in its third nation inazuma standard characters are now useless it looks like this now a pay to win game for you to enjoy hopefully some of the featured characters can also be obtained through standard banners in the future like the four stars

this game is amazing it really is the amount of effort put in it is a beautiful landscape a world to escape to the storyline is amazing and had me hooked from the beginning and the characters and their designs are so fun to build and work with however it is been a year and there are inevitably problems that need to be solved at higher ars rewards get progressively worse the anniversary is also not helping encourage players nor solve these problems

i have been playing since launch and i have seen some major improvements on in game content throughout the updates however communication between the company and players has been steadily declining to the point where sincere feedback is not taken into account anymore it definitely influences the experience especially with a game in which people invest a lot of time and for many players money as well

the game starts out very good but it can become repetitive after a while the recent land added was underwhelming and felt rushed and the anniversary is the most lack luster i have ever seen in a game it is hard to believe it is a celebration when the company did not hing for it seems like they are content to put in the bare minimum to keep players engaged after the opening areas

played this game since last december and it was really good i did not mind the scarce resources too much since i played in moderation but at times i felt significantly limited by the resin system and artifact grind i ended up buying the monthly subscriptions to show my support for the game but the direction and attitude the company has taken towards their player base is patronising and unthankful to say the least apart from that i love the music and will listen to it on spotify from now on

the game has been nothing short but wonderful from the start however with the sheer amount of bugs that annoys the hell out of players naming the horrifying auto aim for bow user as an example has not been even mentioned in any bug fixes till today is a sign of how they cherry pick feedbacks from players the latest two one patch has a very obvious rush vibe to it be it in the story quest to the character development needless to say happy birthday mhy

the quality of the game content follows a linear curve along progression easy fun well done in the beginning by the time you get to end game it feels like playing a thinly veiled money making scheme the first nation was great the second was good the third released in two has been wholely lackluster exploration was fun for a while combat is designed poorly progress and the game throws more enemies at you use a shield or get hit into five other enemies hitting you into five more

beautiful game great story so far and runs smoothly on my phone samsung galaxy would love to see controller support for mobile added as it would be more comfortable to play that way edit over the past year there has been a large drop in communication with players bug fixes and rewards content is heavily gated behind resin energy making the level of farming needed difficult there is a great game here aside from these issues but it needs some serious work at this point

i started game when they were officially released in american and enjoyed a fair bit for a while then i lost interest and kind of stopped playing the game after almost a year i came back to play because my friend said there are a lot more things to do which was true then i was anticipating an anniversary event to boost me up a bit and slowly started to see a lot of people talking about event being really mediocre and turns out it was not only i was baffled by amount of free wish they give out amount of effort they put into anniversary event was just mind boggling in a worst way possible i think it would have been better if they just did not give out anything for free for the anniversary event and just put deep discounts on some of the stuff they offer would have been much better i cannot give anything lower than two star because i did actually enjoy the game and missing out on anniversary freebee will not probably make myself stop playing but this lack of communication ought to get some negative opinions and i think they are all valid

the game is beautiful and the combat system and characters are fun the story started good but the recent inazuma arc was rushed and messy the developer has also slowly stopped communicating with the player base they have ignored common simple qol changes looking at you expidition user interface and common feedback on characters kits this does not feel like the game i started playing a year ago i hope things change for the better

needs controller support asap basic things are easy to do but once you get into rapid character changing combos and tighter movement it becomes a hassle also i have large hands that cover the screen and imporant information gets covered like the bottom character in the party roster on the right side i play on a note ultra and cannot fathom how others play it on small screens

i do not really do review bombing i hate the idea of it but ifi am being honest the rating is not just for the rewards i have come back into the game and i can in all honesty say it is gotten dull the grind and daily content is short and unfullfilling the gacha system continues to be trash with the two hard pity necessary for banner maps being kind of barren and the exploration basically boiling down to go to the interactive map alt tab to genshin and go where the map tells you to they did fix the gameplay from a year ago to being more interractive and responsive but from materials grind to level up boost grind it is too tiring to actually get into if you plan on bothering just play through the story mode and do not get invested wait for a couple of months maybe play only the event stuff and when a new region comes out just play the story mode on that too

to be honest the mobule version should be less demanding on space its practically impossible to download and play this game on most phones unless you have a high capacity phone or sim card you will never get to even see or play the game at all i do not like having to delete everything just to see a insufficient storage message

really cool just too much for probably a lot of phones to handle my phone is good quality but it still struggles with the game i cannot even play anymore due to all the updates and having it not be able to load and all the lagging i would suggest making an option where you can make the graphics be less advanced for those with lower quality phones

at first everything was five stars but then you get to the end and you get extremely gated collecting materials becomes a chore and you spend hours just running around the map endlessly for the time doing the same route actual materials such as coins and xp require you to wait for resin and the game play that is tied to spending resin takes no more than a few minutes it is fine if you want to enjoy the graphics but do not bother spending money on this

this game is good buti am rating it from the perspective of a completionist in that regard this game is flawed there is an ongoing bug with the anemoculus where they can get collected without registering meaning you are hardlocked from ever maxing out the statues two anemoculus an incredible frustration as i have spent the vast majority of my gameplay methodically collecting them marking the map in a grid system etc edit geoculus bug fixed itself with restarting anemo still bugged

at first it was a very fun game then once you progress later in game the resin system appear the resin system is so limiting that you basically stuck cannot upgrade weapon cannot upgrade character etc i will probably leave this game soon as the grind get really crazy after the initial stage almost impossible to stay as free to play user unless you just want to torture yourself genshin impact resin impact

its a great game with beautiful graphics a storyline with substance and a decent or mediocre cooperative option depending on how much you like playing with others but there is just one thing that ruins the whole experience whenyou are knee deep in genshin impact the resin system is absolutely atrocious and limits the progression to upgrade your characters by a mile it really differentiates a whaler between a free to play and in the middle are of course the goldfish dolphins if only the resin system was not so bad it would be an absolutely amazing game there is just a lot of things to be done but man the resin in just a knee capper just to clarify i am at adventure rank and have spent a bit of money on the game and not speaking out of my ass the resin system is just garbage

before i begin i wanted to like this game unfortunately there are so many small issues i had within the first minutes i could not continue first option settings not available right away and when i did unlock them they were very lackluster second please put a lock on feature third please let us adjust control placements the movement pad is almost awkwardly too far towards the center also picking up items requires pressing the button in the middle of the screen very annoying

this game is fantastic starting off but grinds to an absolute halt after playing for the first few days you barely can progress as more and more roadblocks start showing up resin system needing enough money xp books materials to upgrade characters and then eventually you will have to only be able to progress using keys unlocked by doing all your dailies for two days deceptive at best manipulative at worst gacha rates developers should really tweak all this because all the good press will sour

truly evidence that popularity does not suggest greatness the game is absolutely beautiful but nothing you do has any substance story is boring and unskippable there is little significance to exploration because you do not need most of the things in the field food is not necessary to progress in the game enhancing gear just feels like an annoying obstacle that you have to get through just so you can keep progressing and perhaps the most irritating thing is how clunky the transitions from activity such as swimming climbing etc are to going back to walking combat especially during timed challenges in fact it is almost like the climbing time challenges are showcasing how terrible the game is at guessing when the player wants to climb up and when the player does not want to climb up it is irritating during normal exploration as well since you will randomly climb up trees for no reason not to mention gacha rates are abysmali am still going to play this because i like gambling with free resources but to say that i like this game just because i plan to play it daily would be a complete utter lie

finished stormterrors lair i can safely say that early on the gameplay is an absolute blast however this game has a few fundamental flaws that ruin mid late game for me the game relies heavily on stun mechanics where the only way to defeat most enemies is to use continuous stunning attacks to prevent them from using their stunlocking combos resistance to attack interruption is an actual stat the world levels up as you do making grinding difficult sometimes controls stop working

great story great graphics great locations but fix the multi player kick function it is stupid that you can be kicked out by players after multi player events finish i lost time and treasure due to this ridiculous feature needless to say this makes me not want to touch multi player until this is fixed

an excellent game i have been playing since launch and have thoroughly enjoyed the journey i have two reasons for not giving five stars for one there used to be good communication between the devs and the community and now there seems to be nothing the second reason is that the most recent archon quest from felt extremely rushed plot lines felt unfinished plot holes were left unaddressed and character development was bad i am hoping to see better stories in future updates

a great game that makes me want to invest some time into it however makes it near impossible to do so due to the energy system resin this makes especially less linear farming such as artifacts extremely lengthy with very little rewards if you get unlucky overall i would still recommend it however would also make clear that this is not a game you can easily pick up and get everything quickly alone due to special five stars that appear like twice a year at best you are okay with grind go for it

definitely one of the games i played for a long time however the more you play the game the more you realize how the games content is actually not that many some might argue that this is false because there is so many nations locations before i would have agreed but after playing this game for more than a year i disagree my reasoning for it is because exploring teyvat is not that hard teyvat is very easy to explore the map is also really easy to understand which makes exploring really easy other than that the characters are all designed well reward system is very flawed in my opinion it takes a long time to actually get primo game currency once you are an end game player which would sometimes brainwash you into pretty much acting as if the daily commission is a chore story lore wise however is really good i love the lore and it is very engaging events in game is sometimes it is extremely uninteresting and sometimes it is really engaging so it just depends on your personal tastes

gameplay is good and the quests are great but the game is truly amazing if you have a phone that has larger storage and is more suited for games that take up battery the game should be able to function much better and not lag so much when you are on low graphics and have a bad ping signal overall the game is great but it would be nice if the game were smoother when a player is using low graphics than when it is on a higher graphic setting to save battery and the amount of lag that happens

great game over all with an engaging storyline and cool characters even if you do not purchase premium items and units the game is not unplayable yet i am not too far in and that could change however from a technical standpoint i have been having trouble running the app since the latest update at first it was just some stuttering frames at times but now just going into a menu is enough to crash the app entirely it was running fine a week ago but not anymore

pretty good game overall the gameplay is fun the graphics are beautiful and the music is amazing it is also the only open world gacha game and has a huge map to explore however it is unfortunately run by a company who does not care about it is community at all their refusal to properly address player concerns and fix issues that have existed since launch makes the user experience extremely frustrating

game starts as rather fun but the longer you play the more design and gameplay flaws you encounter overall experience can be summarized as following pros fun to explore world with various puzles decent story regular various events note due to the big differences in event gameplay mechanics some may be to your liking and some may not but considering overall variety it will still be a positive thing four smooth combat albeit lacking some necessary user interface elements cons daily routine becomes too repetitive and boring after finishing world exploration character progression is horrible with excessive rng elements where it should not be in the first place looking at you artifact domains developers feedback is lacking and issues that have been bothering players since day are still unaddressed conclusion overall it may be ok to try this game for a bit just do not expect much in the long term

genshin is probably the most beautiful game you can play at the moment the univers is simply stunning the animations are great though i wish they could be skipped after they have been seen once like old school rpgs this is one of the points where mihoyo fails to draw from its predecesors the characters are generally well thought out and fun to discover where things get hard is once you actually play the game the controls are absolutely horrible and controller support is nowhere in sight ios has had this for nearly a year now but some of the workarounds people have come up with on android have led to users being banned leaving you to contend with very underwhelming touchscreen controls you will also find yourself fighting the engine much more than the enemies there are a number of ways the game becomes anti immersive from the constant zooming in depending on your combat actions there should simply be a way to turn off auto zoom off but this illudes the devs completely to enemies walking off a preset area mid fight where they will walk back to their spawn point and regen one hundred percent hp and have you start the fight over something to drive you insane when fighting new and more powerfull foes all in all the game is good but some basic improvements would make it much more enjoyable

disappointing i have a relatively nice phone but this game lags like hell and heats up my phone real fast it is hard to use the controls on a phone too also the game is fun but its so annoying to have to level up several levels to get to the next story quest i wish there was more help in game to help you learn combat skills and creating strong characters the story is definitely interesting its just such a hassle to play

its a fantastic game very good on battles and story but it is lacking alot of things for starters there are cut scenes that need to be fixed in terms of when characters come into play second the graphics are quite splotchy and does not look as nice when you get close it may also help to make it better for far less optimized devices edited

really enjoy this game two issues one ios has wireless controller support but android does not that is absurd please fix it two the process of pairing a save file between devices console and android for example has a very specific sequence that needs to be followed otherwise you have to beg customer support to unlink one device which takes potentially more than a week and a half this sequence is not explained clearly except for on forums which you go to after you have gotten it wrong

pros one it is a beautifully crafted world with a rich story and lovable characters two the combat is fun and the exploration is enough to keep one adventuring for a while three you can tell that the developers put so much love into this game but the marketing division it is a mess and that leads me to cons one certain systems time gating remain broken since launch two rng on top of rng three predatory monetization four too much focus on money not enough on fixing content all in all solid

great game ifyou are here for the experience i would argue even the best one out there however if you were to stay here for long you gonna have to deal with a variety of problems from devs not fixing the most simple mistakes for years no joke to blantly ignoring their community when they are unhappy probably the most significant issue with this game is that it does not allow you to play whenever you want to play it afteryou are done with the quests so instead it becomes a second job

okay mobile game awful story writing with a lot of unecessary dialogue characters are well designed and mostly balanced but some have years old glitches left unfixed while they continue to pile on new characters e giga dionas skill and burst still hit objects instead of enemies even when they are closer than the objects wish there were more settings we could mess with obviously pay to win

it is a good game and free to play friendly i just installed this after a long time i left but it has has a very troublesome problem which you were downloading the resources and suddely the internet connection become sucks or you quit halfway your current progress will be loss as you will start to the very beginning of your download the game cannot detect its game file such a waste of time

its great i have been playing since launch basically so it is been a fun time for sure but i cannot say its perfect for newer players it will be difficult to level up certain characters due to materials being locked until you reach certain levels or clear certain areas i do not think i would recommend it for a casual player but someone whos going to marathon the game in like a week should not have too much of a problem

i would have to say that this game is an exceptional one in terms of lore quality the beauty of going on adventure and experiencing fantasy however it is not friendly to new players there is a lot a new player must overcome in order to truly experience what a lot of us veteran players do new player lock out is a definitely driving those who wish to enjoy the game away especially if they are bound to start off as mobile players this needs to be fixed and so does the resin system

definitely a good game i play it a lot on pc and i downloaded it for chromebook because google play said it was compactible which it is but sadly the graphics are set to be high as a default on mobile and it always crashes every time i enter the door and reach the loading screen the game really needs a settings option outside of the game or have default graphics values to be lower please do this change

im only giving it three because the actual game is good but the mobile version is a pain the hyakunin ikki event is one example it takes many tries to get enough points to get the first rewards and the reason is not that i cannot defeat the enemies it is that the enemies take an actual minute to spawn all the time trials in the mobile version have this issue too the objectives do not spawn in under ten seconds the laggy cutscenes in quests are unbearable when you actualty care about the story

fun at first however not much is explained very well for new players leaving most people to find out through trial and error open map puzles have hardly any hints on how to do them and the rewards for those puzles and the entire game for that matter are very lackluster gear for characters can take months depending on your luck gameplay and visuals are nice but take up so much space overall rng based gameplay for anything you actually need to play

i love this game fun game play good map but the only problem is it takes too much space this is like the only game i can have it takes storage to download every good part of the gameplay but i seriously cannot get one other app i really hate that part of genshin but although it takes too much space it is a fun game if it is possible please lower the amount of space genshin impact uses to run smoothly or i will not be able to talk to my friends thank you

it is a great game overall good graphics nice gameplay and a really inmersive story with beautiful characters tailored so everyone finds a favorite but the games big flaw is in mechanics i swear when it comes to farming most things are not so hard to get but artifacts which are indispensable for actually using a character you like are so boring and tedious to aquire you will probably end up dropping the game after you have to farm for them you should think over that hoyoverse

great to a point i played this on phone and playstation although there is a point where you get stuck unless you have a lot of friends that play too one area you cannot complete without a full team of players there needs to be guilds to complete for those who have friends just not interested in this type of game otherwise your stuck and cannot progress ending all the work you have completed which is a huge downfall for the game itself if you can get multiple friends to play cool go for it

first of all this game is good good graphics good music and good story but it is lagging and consume more battery and give us the option to twick the draw distance because it load the metres away mountain and that is what makes the game lag most of the time the camera is far far away from the character if it is near the character i would be immersed in the gameplay the camera zoom is not helping because after some times the camera comes to the normal position

its a great game the visuals along with it being playable on computer as well as my phone with the same account and enabling crossplay is great the only let down and to me it is worth two stars is the lack of controller support if when they add it i will update but till then i will have to play it on computer

has quite some issues bugs in characters that is never been fixed ridiculously high prices for in game currency that just is not justifiable at this point poor storylines complete ignorance when it comes to complaints by international players the list could go on and on extreme high usage of storage space however it is still an amazing game stunning sceneries graphics characters and events i enjoy this game more than anything else but i hope there will be some changes in the future

the downloading resources is repeating back to zero i waited for several hours to download it to gigabyte i paused it and i decided to continue it later but it back to start again repeating me to download gigabyte resources i did not reset or clear anything and the storage of this game is here filling my phone storage i repeat it two times but it did not work back to start again

i play on pc because this game refuses to load on my phone the game overall is amazing with one of the best elemental systems i have ever seen it can be laggy on pc and takes up a huge amount of space it is very large for a mobile game and despite having uninstalled and reinstalled changed phones used internet connection ect it never goes past the loading screen it is my favorite game but i do not see how playing on mobile is even viable considering the sheer size of the game

the game is really good with the aspects of character designs storyline and the battle mechanics the only thing that bugs me is the resin even ifyou are trying to build up a good character or you want to go for domains you cannot get anything nor can you upgrade anything ifyou are out of resin just increase the amount of resin permanently or just reduce the time in which the resin accumulates

i have been playing for a while now and i absolutely love this game however after the two four update i noticed that everytime i use an elemental burst of a five star character to a number of enemies or group of enemies and bosses all of their hp bar disappears including those that i did not use it to even the names of npcs disappear and is disrupting my gameplay it is draining and time consuming to restart the game everytime i use my characters burst so i hope that this can be fixed thanks

i usually play it on my laptop and i liked it so much i wanted to play on my mobile device until i removed several apps and pictures videos and still was not able to download it the amount of space this game takes up for mobile is unreal to the point of litterally being unrealistic it takes up about one four one three of my phones total storage however on pc it is a wonderful game and if you have the storage capacity i encourage you to try it the graphics and fighting mechanics are wonderful

updates suck on android i have done pre downloads and even new versions always mess up getting on and i have to completely uninstall reinstall the game sometimes like now even that does not work soi am writing this since i cannot even get on the game i love the game in general but getting resources to get new characters is extremely time consuming considering they only give you five to primo for a majority of the quests ps is easier by far for both gameplay and updates

i do not like giving it a three star it is one of the best and most advanced games on the store right now but it does not justifies the space it takes the game is already big but also a lot of unnecessary stuff is takes up space even after they are over event cinematics etc there should be option to not download or remove this unnecessary stuff the game can be adjusted better for mobile too even the best phones turns into demo of hell after minutes of playing this

its awesome i would give it a five star if there were not any problems in my game play everytime i play ofc i log in so the problem is i do not know how many minute i can play but everytime i do smth like fighting enemies the game starts lagging and the screen turns back and kicks me out and when i am in cooperative and that happens all my progress is restarted i hope this gets fixed because i really wanna play genshin while on the go

gacha impact is a game where you collect scannotily clad mostly under age women and some dudes and fight monsters the game is great gameplay is responsive and flashy the game falls apart pretty quick pay your time or pay with money to make stupid inconveniences go away once progression is really important in games and this game wants to monetize that to encourage you to spend as much money as possible games get so much better than this

i really love the game and the fun gameplays and events that they have to offer however i would love to recommend with others to play the game i have some problems whenever i play it for a short amount of time the game ends up lagging completely and crashes not only the app but my phone as well i have to wait for about minute with the screen of a character i last played with their attacks and skills up still in a time freeze this happened too many times andi am worried for future players

played in the beginning left for a while wanted to get back in for the anniversary but they really dropped the ball for anniversary with the weak ten pull this game has a fairly unreasonable pay structure for rewards the lack of resin has always been a huge problem this game was well received initally and i had high hopes it is too bad there have not been positive changes to improve enjoyment for the players overall

would love it if the game was optimized better it takes up quite a lot of space heats up the phone eats up the battery and lags heavily on slightly older phones a friend had to unfortunately drop this game altogether due to the increasing size andi am worried many others including myself will be affected as well all in all a great game love the open worldness and gorgeous atmosphere alongside wonderful music storyline is engaging with promising characters to boot

had to change my review though this game is made well filled with wonderful characters and story the game has slowed down to a crawl content is slow coming events are lackluster and boring the events that are fantastic should be simply in the game available to everyone at anytime it is sad that some of these events will never return resulting in new players in missing out on all the fantastic lore provided

it is my favourite game and i am very dedicated to it but there is a flaw in the game which bugs the hell out of me the wangshu quest disables co operative mode until completion but for me and many others the quest is not operating properly so i have to sweep it under the rug but that is impossible due to the fact i need co operative mode to make the game enjoyable

this game has a lot of issues that are hard to excuse but the parts that are fun are fun it would take a lot of time to get into all of the issues but to touch on some of them it seems like the characters that are struggling and need help will not get it inconsistent mechanics that seemed a randomly apply to one character but not all there is a lot of dead time do not pull in the weapon banner unless you intend to spend a lot of money rewards for completing quests seem really lackluster

tl dr be prepared to be disappointed ifyou are a gacha player who likes to grind play a lot but in general its very enjoyable many problems appeae in the form of of end content and the energy timegated system to get artifacts progress for better gear the story is very enjoyable but do not expect something well written a lot of character problems event rewards are okay but itself very boring to play there is no replayable content side quests can become very tiresome and the gacha is insane

after playing for one year genshin impact is an amazing game at the surface level great world building character designs combat system story and graphics however going deeper into the game it has many glaring issues that have not been addressed lack of endgame content high effort for low rewards qol changes resin system artifact rng overpriced gacha and the recent downgrading of story and characters the game becomes increasingly disappointing and a daily chore in the end

edit one of the greatest open world animethetic action rpgs of this time world character design is amazing and a joy to explore while listening to enchanting orchestral osts combat and grinding gets abit boring after a while but that is due to endgame but most of the latest characters need extreme balancing and any new players will be sol until they spend hours of main story extra weeks of grinding adventure rank to be able to upgrade them mats are adventure rank region locked this system makes no sense

i am new to this game so far i enjoy playing it my only suggestion is that they must not bar adventurers from leveling up their ranks because god it is so hard to do the ascension task at level though my heroes are at a higher level with the right element to combat the electro hypostasis still my heroes were underpowered it is so tiring to play and deal with them over and over again you should also consider hero replacements if your deployed heroes were all down haha

it is a great game but it would be greater if it has controller support another issue in the mobile version is that sometimes objects takes a long time to load and the interact button is sometimes late also the resin refresh rate feels like forever and the cost for just one wish is just too much with those odds of winning a four five star character

the game is so good early on and i have no major problems with the gacha for enjoyments sake it is free to play friendly there is also a small subscription option welkin bp for low spenders which is good in my personal opinion as well however resin is a major problem with this game specially at end game you get your characters you pull and get weapons then what to do with them it is frustrating that you can only fight a couple of bosses a couple of domains then you get random drops which do not amount to any upgrade andyou are done for the day at this point it is a daily login app not a game

a beautiful game many amazing characters and places to visit powerful weapons however sometimes the lack of communication and basic rewards with fans is frustrating especially adventure rank rewards the amount of resin needs to be adjusted as well as artifact rng we also need more reasons to play for more than minutes later into the game the only thing you end up doing is logging in doing commissions burning resin and logging off it often just feels like a chore

i enjoy the game but the rng gacha system being on basically everything really pulls it back it is even on the stats of the gear itself and there is no way to change them so you just have to continue griding and pray more cooperative things to do would be very nice balancing for characters is not the best also no controller support for android after a year really sucks all that said it is very pretty and nice music story can be good to

honest review game is beautiful honestly have not seen mobile games come close in terms of graphics and music score for beginners the game is fine but as you progress you realize the multiple issues this games has resin needs adjustments and the higher ups should listen to the community in terms of these issues it is also very free to play but pulling a character especially one you want is very difficult and expensive especially when you have decide between saving primo or not

it gets very repetitive after a while and dialogues are way to long every new character you get is unusable unless you would be able to upgrade them to the same level as other characters and upgrades takes a lot of time the android version does not support controller which is not very optimal

good game but the resin system needs a rework it was fine when the game first came out due to limited amount of characters but seeing as we have double the amount of characters to farm for now the resin regeneration and cap needs to be much higher than before also the game is also quite lacking in end game content with only the spiral abyss dps check at the moment if there could be some kind of boss raid cooperative content would be much appreciated

awesome game beautiful art style huge open world map incredible ost really nice characters but keeps accumulating bugs who never get fixed or addressed the history writing recently got real rushed and bad character comes half baked on gameplay and their relevance on history is almost non existent even side characters have way more relevance and impact than the playable ones additionally the lack of proper communication throw down the mayor positive aspects of the game unfortunately

the gameplay world and music is fantastic but the lack of communication and community interactivity lately has been the most abysmal i have seen with a gacha this game started out very strong in these aspects but they have deteriorated at an alarming rate i do not mind the lack of rewards for anniversary but i just wish there was more fanfare more communication and transparency acknowledge problems instead of trying to sweep them under a rug and say they are going to be fixed

while the game itself is not bad it has become boring where there are less stuff to do there are a lot of re works of many characters that needs to be done i would also like to address the underwhelming reward of the anniversary where everything are web event and less in game content that has a few rewards

you are doing great with the map expansions puzles are fun finding secret hidden chest is fun doing hidden quest is fun but exploring the map with maxed out characters is boring because you can do one hit per kill please add high risk zones for maxed out characters make us feel that we still need healers while exploring maps

the beginning experience is fun but at endgame the content becomes very dry and there is nothing meaningful to do outside of waiting for energy over time the devs started to get more careless and stopped acknowledging player feedback as much they have ignored multiple bugs with characters that have been there for a long time and now with the anniversary they have essentially ignored the player base entirely sad to see aside from that the characters are pretty cool

great game but there is still room for improvement please raise resin from to and condense resin from five to ten more cost halving opportunities for weekly bosses artifact sets are hard to complete please implement a rotation for the pieces the game visuals and soundtrack are ten out of ten it is just that if we go into the stage of filler patches again then we need the resin system to improve play at your own risk this game has greedy management

it was a really fun game however the endgame content felt like chores everyday there is no more adventure and fun and challenge besides the spiral abyss which is relatively easy for some but still rewards are so cheap and even for a gacha it still requires you to put so much money and effort into even getting to their pity which does not even guarantee the five star you want sometimes the soundtrack and graphics are amazing but on what has happened during these past few weeks is really bad

a fun blend action rpg adventure game with rather impressive visuals soothing soundtrack solid stories and fun characters the game is just stuck with a very tedious boring and sometimes frustrating endgame where it ends up being a massive grindfest and a highly predatory gacha system where all but five of the highest rarity units are limited to event specific banners also the company is mad stingy with its anniversary rewards

used to be a really good game but the recent quests feel rushed and the plot was anti climatic it is starting to feel superbly unfriendly to free to play players and rewards have been disappointing there is nothing much to do daily and farming rarely gives anything good lore in the game now feels stale and even though they created a good setting for inazuma the promotional posters and built up suspense was useless by the end of the quest

developer does not listen to feedback despite putting out a survey after every major update several characters are completely worthless or suffer from bugs which remain unfixed six months after their release resin system heavily limits gameplay as almost everything relies upon it would rate higher if they simply addressed issues since the base gameplay is actually very good

very good game easy to hook have some small issues which i always feedbacked but seem like not to fix anytime soon music and gameplay is great story characters and mechanic system are good at first but become unbalanced and go slightly downhill maybe because of rushing or low quality control while the game itself is great it is still have a lot of drawback recommended to gacha veteran and lover

been playing for a year now and all i can say is that the resin system needs improvement as for it is hard to farm for artifacts and materials with resin per day as well the rewards are somewhat stingy not enough for wishes which makes you pay real money for the wanted character weapon great storyline and graphics really like how a open world game that does not really limit you to something is finally on mobile

initially the game was awesome hands down it was the best i had ever played wrt graphics scenery characters and story the only disappointment is not the rewards but the lack of consideration towards the player base the story and world building is hands down the best but the pace at which updates roll are slow but frequent the amount of time it actually takes for the story to move on is too long and tires out many people like me minimal spender and if you miss a day you feel like you have lost something precious you have been building up i do not want more rewards hecki am fine with what we already have but please put more lore and give characters like lisa kaeya and amber more love so we can like them for who they are as characters and not the colorful numbers that pop up on the screen oh and where is ludi harpastum we were supposed to get that too right

the game is great beautiful scenery and music the story is great characters are amazing and its a very unique and enjoyable but as you progress there is lack of any sort of end game content except for the spiral abyss which please instead of making floor and worse just add more floors or add something new also please communicate with your players and listen to what they want its a lovely experience here and we want it to be better thanks

the graphics are beautiful the world is fun to explore the character design is amazing the music is also very nice it is a fun game in general but it needs a lot of effort to do stuff that just give you low rewards like the first anniversary you can give free stuff for promotions you can give a free four star for an event but sth better than ten wishes for one whole year of playing is enough at least fix some bugs or improve some aspects

edited first review might be too emotional love the games gameplay and music there are non event activities you can do to pass the time eg do music hangout at a sims house hide and seek events come by at least once or twice a week though cannot still say much more about the games anniversary games lore is very interesting though the latest chapter is a bit lacking of sense there are also posts that are still not implemented distributed eg wings from the event from a fast food chain switch version of the game

visually stunning game and amazing soundtracks however most of the aspects of the game namely the domains relies heavily on rng which is quite frustrating the current pace for which the main story progresses is also slow the resin system whilst a normal feature in gacha games is severely limiting in genshin you can use up a days worth of resins in less than ten minutes but the greatest downside of this game is the way the company handles rewards and compensations which is lackluster

i have been playing since launch and have faithfully played until i hit the burnout wall for a couple months before archipelago update i have spent way more than i like to think on this game andi am not terribly proud of that ultimately this is a decent good game great art amazing visuals fun but the greediness from the gacha rates the resin system the artifact rng its sucking the life out of the player base add in the lack of endgame content and the lack of rewards and its a disaster

i mean the skeleton of the game is good solid gameplay good story exploration but then there is the really bad systems like resin gacha in general artifacts which makes the game just way less fun to play additionally the rewards in the game are not the best to say the least

late game makes you wish the company was not so stingy voice acting is good quality in every language runs okay on a galaxy but is better on pc albeit with locked fps characters are cool cutscenes are extravagant graphics are amazing exploration is a blast and grinding is fun it is a shame about the greed and the lack of rewards

repetitive after you finish all the current story updates but inbetween updates you can farm primo to save for new characters story and characters are great but wish we could somehow breeze through the time consuming non important daily commissions i between updates also wish there was an easier way to keep track of your wishes like a counter or something in the banner pages so we can easily see when we get our guaranteed five star

i really wish i could give this game a five star rating the open world is phenomenal and fun to explore as someone who is now in the late gamei am trying to entertain myself with photo taking of the beautiful scenery etc however ever since the two update things have really gone downhill the english stream for the two one update was delayed by one and a half hours characters have been released despite having seemingly unfinished kits and now the anniversary rewards mihoyo listen to the fans

overall the game is already good but the mechanics sucks please consider removing or decreasing the amount of resin needed for artifacts since it is one of the highest resin consumer on the game the artifacts system is based purely on luck to get the artifacts needed with good stats and sub stats please also consider changing the daily commission the rewards should differ based on difficulty ten for the easy and for hard commisions it may be randomized or fixed so its more rewarding

genshin impact is a great adventure without an entry barrier exploration is similar to breath of the wild collecting climbing gliding however combat is a fluid dance b w managing your partys abilities and chaining attacks the characters are all distinct with unique personalities the story filled with beautiful cutscenes lore and voice acting a visually impressive game edit decreased score due to low gacha rates and freemium currency i have hit soft hard pity for over half a year

i have played this game since release and i loved it exploration of a beautiful world amazing characters interesting lore but afteryou are done exploring and finished the quests there is nothing late game is a never ending grinding hell and that is it there is nothing left to do they keep releasing characters worth hundreds of euro or months of grinding and saving full of problems that they will not even address the story does not make any sense anymore the devs do not care and it shows

it was really exciting at first but now the storylines and characters are getting too boring the new events are not unique nor enjoyable once you reach a certain adventure rank the game becomes boring and repetitive it is getting very obvious that the games focus is on getting new players and does not care about its old players

it is been almost one year since i started playing this but i rate it three stars because of a issue in the game my device is redmi note seven pro and runs perfectly fine in medium graphics however when i enter my serenitea pot the game freezes after two second of entering so i have to close the game and restart again from the long process of loading screens sometimes it also freezes when i try to interact with something within the pot please fix this problem then i will reconsider the rating

while the game itself is amazing this game is not meant to be played on mobile its highly optimized but there is still a lot of lag tabbing out of the app will cause you to relog into the game with an insanely long load time this app should only be used for story dialogue or character enhancement anything where lag would not matter

when this game came out it was extremely good and i would have probably given it five stars but i wanted some time to chew on it exploration the world and core gameplay are all satisfying and fun characters are well designed and lots of cool secrets and clever things hidden for you to find my issues the materials in the game are cumbersome to get since weapons characters and equipment all need materials to level the gatcha rates pity or not are very very low steep power curve

so i really love this game i even have it on my pc but for some reason it is not going past the loading point here since my pc is gone for repair playing from phone was one of my remaining options left but this is and i say highly annoying because the first time i actually downloaded it it glitched the heck out of my photo gallery and after several re downloads it is not getting past this point fixing of this issue as soon as possible would be highly appreciated

i really like this game the graphics music characters and gameplay are all fantastic but for me personally i find that i cannot play it without a controller on my android phone unfortunately they have not added support for android controllers and show no signs they ever will this has prevented me from playing any further whenever controller support is added though i will come back to play and update my review appropriately

i really like the game but it does not run nearly smooth even in the lowest settings on my gigabyte ram phone not just that it is extremely difficult to catch butterflies lizards fireflies or the crystal core flies they are really hard to catch most of the time even if i am standing closer than cm to these things i cannot catch then because the option does not show and it really ruins the mood please fix these things these problems really ruin the whole experience

really love the game and it is concept however i cannot even enjoy the game specially it is graphics to the fullest the moment the stormterror appeared my game suddenly glitched and cannot see anything but bluish and some random colors on the screen you should try to fix this and optimize the game for a better gaming experience for all my phone even met the games conditions but somehow the game becomes glitchy during cutscenes please optimize the game furthermore really want to play this

pretty good game cute characters and story lines just wosh we could move while using our weapons or magic help with dodging more the game constantly losses connection specially during a mission which causes you to have to do it all over again and the game eats the phone battery life way too quick

the game great and all but i have two issues one you cannot switch server without losing your save data so could you add data transfer between two servers make it like once every two weeks or month that you can transfer server two there has been an awful amount of lag lately even if running on high end device on the lowest possible graphic settings the game jitters while loading stuff it is fine tillyou are just trying to explore but in combat or while flying late responses are fatal

a very good game but it is too bad that the only way of progress lays behind the gacha nothing to really do after a certain amount of time if you hope for a game to grind out without paying not your option at all you cannot get far without paying money because chances of getting the good chars are really low and collecting chars is the only real option of progress here as was said before

game itself is ok mechanics are essentially from botw where i do miss the fighting mechanics all the fun things like throwing bombs enemies will pick up etc have been replaced with simple mechanics where you just press the attack buttons till the enemies are dead there is loads of stuff to do and it is free to play game is not very well optimized on modern flagship phones there is no performance difference in highest and lowest graphic settings the game stutter and lags constantly

overall a pretty good game the graphics are amazing character gameplay is decent storyline is interesting but the pity system needs improvement and it also lacks endgame content most importantly though please add fa system pretty disappointed they have not added it by now considering the amount of players getting hacked every day

i love this game honestly the art is beautiful and it has many storylines the biggest downside is it had so many freezed up moments like i can barely play the game smoothly without it lagging up like it would work fine for a bit after i start it but then it just does not work later at all i cannot even report it because of that

genshin impact is a great game although there is an serious issue with the sound and alot of static gets sent through the phone not to mention the cutscenes tend to freeze half the time which tends to ruin the experience somewhat i would love it if you could fix these issues as soon as possible edit now the game keeps crashing every time i try to play it i would greatly appreciate if you could fix the issue

do not get me wrong the game is great and all but the problem is the crashing and lagging also the character switching whenever i need to switch character it would most of the time lag and take minutes for it to even work also recently my game has been crashing wheni am playing this has happen multiple times now the game is also laggy itself it would freeze as i am in a fight etc and i would sometime have to even turn my phone on and off for it to work please fix this

a great experience whose potential is crippled by the lack of controller support every platform but android now supports controller input and sorry to say that makes it the weakest way to play say what you want touch controls are awkward and unsatisfying the fact that this version of the game still relies solely on them is the one thing keeping me from playing this more

the game keeps crashing and crashing everytime when the story part comes all i see is black and when i play it keeps on lagging and it is not smooth i cannot play well and did not see what happened in the story it will only appear when the story is over i like the game the graphics the voice over characters and etc but i just cannot play when it keeps on crashing

well to be honest in terms of graphic this game is superb i mean console level graphic on mobile phone but a gamer not only wants that but a story that engage them the story is slow the character level up process is dreadful the fights are repetitive and boring after some point it is like they have showed everything enemy character way to soon and in terms of engagement they are introducing boring events in place of the actual story and the other regions i am slowly drifting away

i fell in love with this game the first few feews after i started playing it is amazing but after a while it gets repetetive after you get to adventure rank and above there is not much to do you repeat everything from defeating bosses to farming for items there is just not much to do i already quit and uninstalled it on my phone but it is still downloaded in my computer and i might consider going back if mihoyo fixes this and makes it so that you do not get bored easily

after reaching rank it tends to get too repetitive especially if you have completed majority of the quests i get to lose interest on the games since you do not have much quests to do primo are hard to come by new characters are harder to get hope you guys make the game more interesting

good basic game idea terrible execution enemies can juggle stun lock and basically destroy you at any level if they choose dodging works sometimes ifyou are exact on the timing also a lot of the game is about choosing the right elements for a battle you cannot do that with a lot of battles because enemies appear around you and you have no time to alter your team a lot of enemies just turn in to a chore just keep slapping them for an hour until they die totally boring game after adventure rank

overall this game is ok biggest problem for me is the controls this game does not give you any joystick options and the fixed joystick is too low it makes combat difficult cause it limits mobility when you cannot go toward the camera easily it is also hard to turn the character because the character switch user interface is right where your other hand naturally lands to move the camera angle i also wish the camera default was angled a little higher because bushes and grass make it really hard to see

i will not rate it less than a three star only because it is a great game reason why i changed it from a five star down to a three star is because whatever you developers did for the update it affected the performance on mobile i have well over the requirements for this game and it lags horribly in some situations please look into the optimization for mobile devices

hi i just wanna say that this an amazing game and experience is top notch there is one problem thou after the last update the game had become so laggy on my phone it used to run smoothly on my redmi note but now even at lowest settings the game still lags a lot and switching between characters really has delays which is a nightmare especially when facing bosses at crucial times i rated the graphics five star and gameplay four but the controls and the way it runs really ruin the fun please fix

amazing game but mobile not so much first the camera will get in your way you have to focus on zooming out majority of the time during fights because the camera settings which you have no real control over constantly force you to zoom in which nine ten you do not want to happen secondly picking up items is a chore as compared to pc and console the prompt to pick up items does not pop up instantly like it does on pc or console it would make more sense if you just instantly picked up items

on my phone it was really glitchy and constantly freezing once you pass the first few levels you have gotta grind for a long time just to open the dungeons and quests but the graphics are amazing and the concept is cool i would be interested in playing it as a console game for a faster pace and smoother game play

game is amazing at first but the more you play spend the worse it gets they have a lot of security and balance issues at the moment which is making many of the player base weary of playing the game and many unwilling to spend and communication on these issues have been poor or poorly received game currently has a lot of progression strain on their stamina system resin specifically mora gold and hero xp getting a new hero takes two weeks of grinding to get them at a playable place then you need to spend even longer farming gear this leaves you at a place of always needing to farm for the future but the game is still great at it is base you can do everything but their end game three tower stages that reset bi monthly you can do those stages but will require a lot of careful investment it is a solid hours of content more if you do not rush through it until the security issues are fixed i would think before spending money otherwise give it a shot for a while but keep tabs on the communities of the game reddit is a good one but can be an echo chamber at times until at the least the security issues are fixed i cannot justify more than three stars and i only stand with that because of how much enjoyment the games world has given me since launch

genshin impact is really fun in the early game the ability to explore the huge landscape is pretty unrivaled for a free game that even runs on mobile but in the end the monetization lets it down if you can stop yourself from caring about getting new characters then genshin can be fun for a long time until you get into the late game where things become quite the grind but if you start to look forward to rolling for characters and if you want one in particular you will be disappointed
